HERO.TITLE: Kanban board
HERO.DESCRIPTION: The Kanban board is one of the tools that can be used when implementing the Kanban development management method. These boards can be seen as a variation on traditional kanban cards.

ABOUT.TITLE: What is a kanban board?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: A kanban board is an agile project management tool designed to help visualize work, limit work-in-progress, and maximize efficiency (or flow). It can help both agile and DevOps teams establish order in their daily work. Kanban boards use cards, columns, and continuous improvement to help technology and service teams commit to the right amount of work, and get it done!
